title: Firewall error
body:
So the firewall errors have happened before and its been fixed for quite a while now except 2 hrs ago i just got that again.
I've tried flushing the DNS, restarting modem, repairing client, doing firewall stuff except none of these fix it.
And after we lost the game due to 4v5 i tried to test if my thing was working in a custom (before it worked after 1 game failed) and it still didn't work
and now I'm stuck in a custom game with no bots and i can't end the game.
just wondering on how to fix this issue preferably permanently  but temp is fine too, and will the minions end the game or am i going to be stuck in a custom game forever?

edit - the game ended about 2 seconds after i posted this

replies.body: The servers are currently crapping themselves. Are you able to reproduce this connection issue under particular conditions, or is it completely random?
